hints.content:
$557 = 106 +{\goldE{?}}$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point 106 to point 557 is labeled, plus question mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6f15446867caa41609f07ddd16015d29158b5976)

Let's start by adding hundreds to ${106}$ until we get as close to  ${557}$ as possible without going over ${557}$.

$\begin{align}
{106} +\purpleD{100}=206\\\\
{206} +\purpleD{100}= 306\\\\
{306} +\purpleD{100}= 406\\\\
{406} +\purpleD{100}= 506
\end{align}$

If we add $\purpleD{4 \text{ hundreds}}$, or $\purpleD{4 00}$, we reach $506$. We cannot add any more hundreds without going over ${557}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 106 to a new point 506 labeled, "plus 400"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/edfec1409772c8168bdfd119f4eaf9513302716a)

Next, let's add tens to $506$ until we get as close to  ${557}$ as possible without going over ${557}$.

$\begin{align}
506 +\blueD{10}=516\\\\
{516} +\blueD{10}= 526\\\\
{526} +\blueD{10}= 536\\\\
{536} +\blueD{10}= 546\\\\
{546} +\blueD{10}= 556
\end{align}$

If we add $\blueD{5 \text{ tens}}$, or $\blueD{50}$, we reach $556$. We cannot add any more tens without going over ${557}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 506 to a new point 556 labeled, "plus 50"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/200874afee6b1596d7cfb521c4597b5e7d811329)

Finally, how many ones should we add to  $556$ to get to  ${557}?$

$556 +\greenD{1}={557}$

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 556 to point 557 labeled, "plus 1"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/15ade583635cb2075e796f49e6668b3f66a612fd)

We added $\purpleD{4 \text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{5 \text{ tens}}$, and $\greenD{1\text{ one}}$ to ${106}$ to get to ${557}$.

$\purpleD{4 00}+\blueD{5 0}+\greenD{1}=\goldE{451}$

![The number line with all of the arrows shown. The original arrow from point 106 to point 557 is labeled, "plus 451." The arrows spans the arrows labeled "plus 400," "plus 50," and "plus 1."](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f2b5c0e0ce037b40968a2fc4c807ffe4c13e5dc4)
